name: Kissmanga Layout
description: This makes the navbar less contrasting, and fix the image as it's inherit size so it can be responsive.

user.name: ThisIllusions
user.about:
I recommend using Stylus for Chrome/Firefox/Opera, the open source fork of stylish..

more info:
https://robertheaton.com/2018/07/02/stylish-browser-extension-steals-your-internet-history/
https://robertheaton.com/2018/08/16/stylish-is-back-and-you-still-shouldnt-use-it/

additional_info:
KissAnime has anti adblock measures "under maintenance," so you'll need to follow these steps to fix it:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KissAnime/comments/969svs/simple_adblock_methods/

If you are still blocked, then try changing your user agent with user agent switcher extension.
https://duckduckgo.com/?q=user-agent+switcher+extension
